author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
#35 #unemployed #Layoff
Turning 35 in China often means the end of your career. Millions face brutal age barriers disguised as “workforce optimization,” losing jobs at major tech companies while buried under huge debts and family pressures. Long hours, relentless competition, and a broken job market leave many struggling to survive.

This video uncovers the tough reality behind China’s employment struggles and what it means for millions caught in the middle. We explore the challenges facing mid-career workers and the deeper issues driving this crisis.

👇 Comment below: What topic about China do you want to see exposed next?
Subscribe for honest, unfiltered stories about life and work in China.
title: 35-Year-Old Career Death Sentence: Ageism, Debt, and the Cruel Reality
